ComicInfo.Summary:
The frog plague explodes as the Black Flame's plan comes to a blazing conclusion. The B.P.R.D., shattered by recent events, marshals its remaining forces, and Liz Sherman puts together all the bits of information she's gathered from dreams and visions to play her apocalyptic role.
Number 23 in the B.P.R.D. series.
The time of the final battle against Katha Hem has come.
The whole B.P.R.D. field team goes up against it.
During the fight, Liz is having another vision giving her hints on how to use the artifact found in Roger's room.
The artifact amplifies her powers to a point where she is able to burn the gigantic Katha Hemm to the ground.
Mysteriously alive, The Black Flame is taken to the undergroud by the frogmen.
